name: stays_properties_detail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool booking_com_v2.
Tool description: Real-time data, unofficial API Booking.com
This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities.. from many hotels around the world to create a travel
API description: Fetch detailed information about a property from the Booking.com API.

id_detail.description: The ID of the property to fetch details for. This ID is obtained from the `stays/properties/list` endpoint.

language_code.description: The language code for the returned information. Defaults to 'en-us'.

currency_code.description: The currency code for the returned information. Defaults to 'USD'.
